automation_productivity.reasoning: Orchestrates multiple agents through crews and flows to automate complex tasks with minimal oversight.

beginner_friendly_onboarding.reasoning: Setup requires Python knowledge and understanding of multi-agent concepts despite good documentation.

code_quality_testing.reasoning: Focuses on orchestration and provides no native tools for testing or enforcing code quality.

codebase_comprehension.reasoning: Agents can integrate custom tools, but the framework lacks built-in features for navigating large codebases.

creative_multimodal_exploration.reasoning: Supports text-based agents and tool calls but offers no dedicated multimodal creativity features.

data_experimental_flexibility.reasoning: Open-source Python framework lets developers connect external APIs and data sources for custom experiments.

visual_no_code_development.reasoning: Configured through code and YAML with no drag-and-drop or no-code interface.

workflow_agent_orchestration.reasoning: Designed specifically for coordinating crews of agents and deterministic flows with event-driven control.
